abstract: Pres Pierre Nkurunziza of Burundi holds rally on mountain near where his government battled rebels, striking defiant tone about his campaign to seek third term, despite Constitution's two-term limit; Nkurunziza points to his party's victory in parliamentary elections as proof of his support, although opposition boycotted elections; Nkurunziza's candidacy has sparked international criticism and threat of revolt domestically.
lead_paragraph: President Pierre Nkurunziza is seeking a third term in Tuesday’s vote; his opponents maintain that he is not entitled.

headline.main: Burundi President Presses On in Disputed Re-election Effort
headline.print_headline: Burundi’s Leader Presses Disputed Re-election Effort

snippet: President Pierre Nkurunziza is seeking a third term in Tuesday’s vote; his opponents maintain that he is not entitled.
